query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', created_at) AS "period",
       COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS "count!"
FROM user_course_settings
WHERE current_course_id IN (
    SELECT id
    FROM courses
    WHERE course_language_group_id = $1
      AND deleted_at IS NULL
  )
  AND deleted_at IS NULL
GROUP BY "period"
ORDER BY "period"
